snippet: The transmission on nearly 470,000 Jeeps could shift by itself from park into neutral, according to a report from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.
abstract: Chrysler is recalling about 469,000 Jeeps worldwide, including 295,000 in United States, citing transmission shifting problems.
lead_paragraph: The transmission on nearly 470,000 Jeeps could shift by itself from park into neutral, according to a report from the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration.

headline.seo: Recall of Nearly 470,000 Jeeps Announced by Chrysler
headline.main: Big Recall for Jeeps Announced by Chrysler
